entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:12 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 09:32 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -9.4°C
Wind: ESE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming west 20 this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
